description: Learned borrowing from Latin praedictiō, praedictiōnis; equivalent to predict +‎ -ion. Compare the Germanic equivalents forespeaking, foretale, foretelling.

entries.meaning: A statement of what will happen in the future.
examples: Synonyms: forecast, foretale, foretelling, prevision, prognosis, prognostication

entries.meaning: (statistics) A probability estimation based on statistical methods.
